Text: This will not work on an NTSC Xbox 360. I downloaded it, burnt it, and popped it in...only to find out it's the "wrong region!"

glawrence at 2010-07-24 01:45 CET:
This will not work on an NTSC Xbox 360. I downloaded it, burnt it, and popped it in...only to find out it's the "wrong region!"


Really? A NTSC console not playing a PAL game? OMGZ!
heyy everybody could someone tell me whats the difference of NTCS and PAL? sorry im new to the xbox game burning thing

NTSC = Only plays on Xboxs Released in the USA, There coded diffrently. While PAL only plays the rest. Simply put, If your american, and in the usa. ALWAYS look for the NTSC, And if your unsure, there's always someone bitching about if its pal or ntsc in the comments lol. Hope to help!
